pr_title: Do not normalize new lines in attributes during config loading

timeline.message: do not normalize new lines in attributes during config loading

timeline.bodyText:
I think it would be a good idea not to introduce two new resources, but to add the 
 value to 'in.xml', to a element, to an attribute, to the escaped data in <data1> and to the CDATA in <data2> .
You'll also have to change quite some other resource files, but it makes the test cover more.
timeline.author: gvanbrakel

timeline.message: include new line in xml, xsl test cases

timeline.bodyText: Should the xmlWriter really resolve the new line? I would think not!
timeline.author: gvanbrakel

timeline.message: have the new line only in an attribute
